articles.title: Defying the Aging Process: Groundbreaking Research Reveals That Our Muscles Reverse to an “Early-Life” State - SciTechDaily
articles.description: New groundbreaking research on African killifish demonstrates that during the late stages of life, our muscles exhibit a remarkable reversal to an "early-life" state, providing valuable insights into combatting muscle wasting. As we get older, our muscles beg…
articles.content:
ByMonash UniversityJune 5, 2023
Researchers from the Australian Regenerative Medicine Institute at Monash University have discovered that as organisms, including humans, age, their muscles revert to… [+7090 chars]
